content: A lot of responses are missing a key part of what the post said… “It’s true that if you want to be seen or heard on social media, you have to put out valuable content on a regular basis.” He isn’t saying go crazy and just start posting things that are in no way quality, but rather just start. Learn from what you are doing by doing it. Don’t just sit back and keep reading, researching, etc. while waiting for the “perfect” time. Just. Start. At least that’s how I interpreted it. ;-) #TheSocialNerd
